chapters.title: Do you accept a cup of tea?

options.title: No
options.feedback: As you are still in the orientation phase of the relationship, it is better to fully assess the situation before accepting tea from Irina. At a later point you may accept a cup of tea from her or you may offer to make the tea with Irina. Sharing a cup of tea has the potential to build the therapeutic relationship but it is not the best action at this time.
